column4: i don't want to have to un-install all of the extras, i'm trying to keep it as minimal as possible, that's why i went with server
if you dont want to search or use trial-and-error to find out what applications add that menu item, you'll have to figure out how to add it yourself.
i've searched google. the only thing i found someone mentioning it is file-roller which i've installed. can you give me some better keywords to seach for?
unfortunately, no i cannot. i am the type of person who would add it themselves if it were not there. and that means doing all the research as well.. perhaps somebody else will know
